model

Class Content

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Content
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Fruit, Ring

    public abstract class Content
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class representing the content of a cell (part of the model in the MVC design pattern)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected Content(int x, int y)
      construct a content at the position ( x , y )

    • Constructor Detail

      • Content

        protected Content(int x,
       int y)
        construct a content at the position ( x , y )
        Parameters:
        x - the abscissa of the cell containing the content
        y - the ordinate of the cell containing the content

      • setContentPosition

        protected void setContentPosition(int newAbscissa,
                      int newOrdinate)
        sets the position of the content
        Parameters:
        newAbscissa - the abscissa of the new cell that will contains the content
        newOrdinate - the ordinate of the new cell that will contains the content

      • getContentPixelsAbscissa

        protected int getContentPixelsAbscissa()
        Returns:
        the abscissa, in pixels, of the cell containing the content

      • getContentPixelsOrdinate

        protected int getContentPixelsOrdinate()
        Returns:
        the ordinate, in pixels, of the cell containing the content

      • drawContent

        protected abstract void drawContent(java.awt.Graphics g)
        draw the content
        Parameters:

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
        compare the object in parameter to this content
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        o - the object to be compared to this content
        Returns:
        returns true if o is a content at the same position as this content, false if not
